pageProduct.name: Sambucol Black Elderbrerry Kids Liquid 120ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Sambucol Black Elderberry Cold & Flu Relief Kids is specially formulated with our unique concentrated Black Elderberry extract, Elderflower extract, Vitamin C and Zinc.

Why take Sambucol Black Elderberry Cold & Flu Relief Kids?

Daycare, school and seasonal changes.

Sambucol Black Elderberry Cold & Flu Relief Kids is formulated with Elderberry & Elderflower, traditionally used in Western Herbal medicine to relieve symptoms of common colds & flu including:
- Cough
- Congestion
- Sore Throat

When to take:
Best taken at the first signs of Cold & Flu symptoms. Common times of increased exposure to germs including Daycare, School, Winter Cold & Flu season or when other members of the family are sick.

Suitable For: Kids

Size: 120ml

Warnings

Always read the labels. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Contains potassium sorbate, sugars, sulfites & soya bean products.

Not to be used in children under two years of age. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

"Active ingredients per 15 mL oral liquid:
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderflower)
flower juice dry 250mg
equiv. to flower fresh 3.75g
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderflower)
fruit juice dry 163mg
equiv. to fruit juice fresh 5.7g
Honey 1.5g
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 82.5mg
Zinc (as zinc oxide) 3.0mg"

Active Ingredients: Active ingredients per 15 mL oral liquid:
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderflower)
flower juice dry 250mg
equiv. to flower fresh 3.75g
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderflower)
fruit juice dry 163mg
equiv. to fruit juice fresh 5.7g
Honey 1.5g
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 82.5mg
Zinc (as zinc oxide) 3.0mg

Contains: Black Elderberry, Elderflower, Honey, Vitamin C & Zinc

Allergen Contains: Gluten| Soybean| Sulphites| Sugars

Allergen May Be Present: Null

Allergen Free From: n/a

Directions

Best taken at first sign of cold or flu symptoms or as recommended by your health professional.
2-4 yrs: 7.5 mL once daily
5-9 yrs: 10 mL once daily
10-12 yrs: 15 mL once daily

Shake well before use.

Not suitable for infants under the age of twelve months. Not to be used in children under 2 years without medical advice.

Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Keep out of reach of children. Safety sealed: do not use if the seal is broken or missing. Store below 25°C.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25C. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing.
